RecordOperationSpec.Name: Child Project Update Country
RecordOperationSpec.Description: Get the country id from the field office of the parent sponsorship location with type of Country Office
RecordOperationSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

SPOperationImplementation.common:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USP_CHILDPROJECT_UPDATE_COUNTRYID ( @ID uniqueidentifier, @changeAgentID uniqueidentifier ) as begin declare @countryID uniqueidentifier = null
if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output
declare @currentDate datetime set @currentDate = getdate()
begin try set @countryID = dbo.USR_UFN_CHILDPROJECT_GETCOUNTRYID (@ID)
if @countryID is null RAISERROR ('Couldn''t find the "Country Office" ancestor Sponsorship Location', 16, 1)
update dbo.USR_CHILDPROJECTEXTENSION set COUNTRYEXTENSIONID = @countryID, CHANGEDBYID = @changeAgentID, DATECHANGED = @currentDate where ID = @ID end try begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR return 1 end catch
return 0;
end
